items.title: Multiple toggles and targets
items.description: A button tag or <a> element can show and hide multiple elements by referencing them with a selector in its data-bs-target or href attribute. Conversely, multiple button tag or <a> elements can show and hide the same element if they each reference it with their data-bs-target or href attribute.
